00022 #define LYRICS_DEFAULT_WIDTH 608
00023 #define LYRICS_DEFAULT_HEIGHT 280

00025 struct Syllable {
00026    double t;
00027    wxString text;
00028    wxString textWithSpace;
00029    int char0; // index of first char of syllable in Lyrics::mText, used only for kHighlightLyrics
00030    int char1; // index of last  char of syllable in Lyrics::mText, used only for kHighlightLyrics
00031    int width;
00032    int leftX;
00033    int x; // centerX, used only for kBouncingBallLyrics
00034 };
00035 
00036 WX_DECLARE_OBJARRAY(Syllable, SyllableArray);

00040 // Override wxTextCtrl to handle selection events, which the parent ignores if the control is read-only.
00041 class HighlightTextCtrl : public wxTextCtrl
00042 {
00043 public:
00044    HighlightTextCtrl(Lyrics* parent, 
00045                      wxWindowID id, 
00046                      const wxString& value = wxT(""), 
00047                      const wxPoint& pos = wxDefaultPosition, 
00048                      const wxSize& size = wxDefaultSize);
00049    virtual ~HighlightTextCtrl() {};
00050 
00051    void OnMouseEvent(wxMouseEvent &evt);
00052 
00053 private:
00054    Lyrics* mLyrics;
00055 
00056    DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
00057 };
00058 
00059 class Lyrics : public wxPanel 
00060 {
00061    DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS(Lyrics)
00062 
00063    enum LyricsStyle {
00064       kBouncingBallLyrics, // Lyrics move from right to left with bouncing ball.
00065       // kGuitarTab,       //v <<future>> Guitar Tablature moves from right to left.
00066       kHighlightLyrics,    // Lyrics show in scrolling page and syllables highlight successively.
00067    };
00068 
00069  public:
00070    Lyrics(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id,
00071           const wxPoint& pos = wxDefaultPosition,
00072           const wxSize& size = wxDefaultSize);
00073    virtual ~Lyrics();
00074 
00075    void Clear();
00076    void Add(double t, wxString syllable);
00077    void Finish(double finalT);
00078 
00079    int FindSyllable(long startChar); // Find the syllable whose char0 <= startChar <= char1.
00080    int GetCurrentSyllableIndex() { return mCurrentSyllable; };
00081    Syllable* GetSyllable(int nSyl) { return &(mSyllables[nSyl]); };
00082    void SetCurrentSyllableIndex(int nSyl) { mCurrentSyllable = nSyl; };
00083 
00084    LyricsStyle GetLyricsStyle() { return mLyricsStyle; };
00085    void SetLyricsStyle(const LyricsStyle newLyricsStyle);
00086 
00087    void Update(double t);
00088 
00089    //
00090    // Event handlers
00091    //
00092    void OnKeyEvent(wxKeyEvent & event);
00093    void OnPaint(wxPaintEvent &evt);
00094    void OnSize(wxSizeEvent &evt);
00095 
00096    // Doesn't seem to be a way to capture a selection event in a read-only wxTextCtrl.
00097    // Thus the HighlightTextCtrl class.
00098    //    void OnHighlightTextCtrl(wxCommandEvent & event); 
00099 
00100    void HandlePaint(wxDC &dc);
00101    void HandlePaint_BouncingBall(wxDC &dc);
00102 
00103    void HandleLayout();

00106    unsigned int GetDefaultFontSize() const; // Depends on mLyricsStyle. Call only after mLyricsStyle is set.
00107    
00108    void SetDrawnFont(wxDC *dc); // for kBouncingBallLyrics
00109    void SetHighlightFont(); // for kHighlightLyrics
00110 
00111    void Measure(wxDC *dc);
